title: Key Special Considerations for AdTech
description:
• Latency and scale are strategic concerns: Engineering and infrastructure must operate under strict latency (ms-level bidding) and massive throughput.
  • Regulatory compliance is a risk factor: Legal and privacy roles are not just reactive but critical to product development.
  • Revenue and margin depend on optimization: Data science and algorithmic bidding are revenue drivers, not just support functions.
  • Market dynamics evolve fast: Partnerships, M&A, and GTM strategies must adapt quickly to industry shifts (e.g., cookie deprecation, UID2, privacy sandbox).


<< Previous: Online Ad Agency Data Ecosystem Chaos

ecosystem.title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
ecosystem.description: Owns strategy, vision, fundraising, and board communication.

ecosystem.title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
ecosystem.description: Manages revenue recognition (especially critical in programmatic), investor relations, and regulatory compliance.

ecosystem.title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)
ecosystem.description: Balances performance-driven growth with industry credibility.

ecosystem.title: Chief Operating Officer (COO)
ecosystem.description: Ensures coordination across departments, owns OKRs, and drives operational execution.

ecosystem.title: Chief People Officer (CPO)
ecosystem.description: Crucial for talent retention in a competitive industry.

ecosystem.title: Chief Product Officer (CPO)
ecosystem.description:
Guides roadmap for ad serving, real-time bidding (RTB), targeting, and reporting tools.
  • Ad Platform UX & Tools (Bid manager, campaign builder, APIs)
  • Targeting & Audience Tools (Segments, lookalike models, contextual tools)
  • Marketplace / Exchange Features (Inventory controls, floors, auction logic)

ecosystem.title: Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)
ecosystem.description:
Owns all client-facing revenue efforts on both demand and supply sides.
  • Advertiser Sales (Agencies, brands, trading desks)
  • Publisher Partnerships (SSP/Exchange integrations, supply deals)
  • Client Success / Account Management (Onboarding, retention, performance)
  • Ad Operations (Campaign trafficking, monitoring, troubleshooting)

ecosystem.title: Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
ecosystem.description:
Owns the architecture and performance of the real-time bidding system and infrastructure.
  • RTB Infrastructure (Low-latency, high-throughput bidding systems)
  • Data Infrastructure (Clickstream data, log-level events, Kafka, Spark, etc.)
  • DevOps / SRE (Uptime, incident response, scalability)
  • Security & Privacy Engineering

ecosystem.title: General Counsel / Chief Legal Officer
ecosystem.description: Especially important for compliance with data regulations and ad policy.

ecosystem.title: VP / Head of Data Science
ecosystem.description:
Core to differentiation in ad performance and margin.
  • Bidding Algorithms / ML Optimization (eCPM prediction, win-rate modeling)
  • Fraud Detection / Quality Scoring (IVT filtering, supply path optimization)
  • Attribution Modeling (Multi-touch attribution, incrementally)
  • Audience Modeling (LTV, churn, lookalikes)

workflows.workflowDescription: Data science and machine learning powering targeting and bidding optimization.
CEO, COO, and CFO functions driving strategic alignment and financial management.
Regulatory compliance, contract management, and trust & safety.
Growth marketing, brand awareness, and industry positioning.
People operations and organizational culture management.
Product development and technical infrastructure supporting RTB systems.
Client-facing and revenue-driving operations including partnerships and account management.
